item.title: Download OCR API for JavaScript | Aspose.OCR API
item.description: Support Forum Download JavaScript Library for Optical Character Recognition (OCR) Release Notes Download Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA What is Aspose.OCR for JavaScript via C++? Aspose.OCR for JavaScript via C++ allows you to extract text from scanned pages, photos, screenshots, and other images directly on a web page or from cross-platform Electron apps.
